name: The Gauntlet (cwru-eecs290)
description:
The Gauntlet is a challenging level-based runner game where the player has to control two characters simultaneously. Watch out, as one character's actions will affect the other  one's lane and vice versa. 

Maneuver your way through three increasingly difficult levels to overcome The Gauntlet!


Music by: DigitalNoiz, ingmar600, Gretplayy
